mapper.select: select ROLE_ID from t_base_user_role_mapping where USER_ID = #{userId}

select t_base_user.USER_ID ,t_base_user.NAME ,t_base_user.USERNAME from t_base_user left join t_base_user_role_mapping on t_base_user.USER_ID = t_base_user_role_mapping.USER_ID where ROLE_ID = #{roleId}

select t_base_user.USER_ID ,t_base_user.NAME ,t_base_user.USERNAME from t_base_user where t_base_user.USER_ID not in ( select t_base_user_role_mapping.USER_ID from t_base_user_role_mapping where t_base_user_role_mapping.ROLE_ID = #{roleId} )
and( USERNAME like concat('%',#{username},'%')
or NAME like concat('%',#{name},'%'))
mapper.delete: delete from t_base_user_role_mapping where ROLE_ID = #{roleId} and USER_ID = #{userId}
